# Pilot

```{r global-options, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(fig.pos = 'H', 
                      echo=TRUE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE)
knitr::opts_knit$set(root.dir = '~/output/experiments/1exit')

```



```{r includes}
library(tidyverse)
library(estimatr)
library(ggplot2)
library(readr)


th <- theme_classic()
theme_set(th)
```

```{r load}

parsed_trials <- read_csv("~/output/experiments/1exit/parsed_trials.csv")
exp_data <- read_csv("~/output/scenes/1exit.csv") %>%
  rename(scene = id)

covariates <- read_csv("~/output/experiments/1exit/covariates.csv")  %>%
  rename(scene = id)


```

```{r analysis}


ate_data <- parsed_trials %>%
  left_join(exp_data, by = c("scene", "furniture", "move")) %>%
  left_join(covariates, by = c("scene", "furniture", "move")) %>%
  mutate(resp_same = Response == "j",
         correct = !xor(base, resp_same))

```


```{r}

exp_data %>%
  left_join(covariates) %>%
  ggplot() +
  geom_histogram(aes(d))
exp_data %>%
  left_join(covariates) %>%
  ggplot() +
  geom_histogram(aes(ogd))

exp_data %>%
  left_join(covariates) %>%
  ggplot() +
  geom_histogram(aes(pixeld))


```

```{r}

by_subj <- ate_data %>%
  group_by(ID)

hr_by_subj <- by_subj %>%
  filter(!base) %>%
  summarise(hr = mean(correct))

fp_by_subj <- by_subj %>%
  filter(base) %>%
  summarise(fp = 1.0 - mean(correct))

subject_performance <- hr_by_subj %>%
  left_join(fp_by_subj, by = "ID")

passed_subjects <- subject_performance %>%
  filter(hr > 0*fp)

good_data <- passed_subjects %>%
  left_join(ate_data)
  

```



```{r}

by_trial <- good_data %>%
  group_by(scene, furniture, move)

hr_by_trial <- by_trial %>%
  filter(!base) %>%
  summarise(hr = mean(correct),
            d = mean(d),
            pixeld = mean(pixeld),
            lvd = mean(lvd),
            ogd = mean(ogd))


```

```{r}

good_data %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = ogd)) +
  geom_histogram()
good_data %>%
  filter(!base & correct) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = ogd)) +

good_data %>%

  ggplot(aes(x = ogd > 0)) +
  geom_bar()

good_data %>%
  filter(!base & correct) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = ogd > 0)) +
  geom_bar()

good_data %>%
  filter(!base) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = d)) +
  geom_histogram()


good_data %>%
  filter(!base) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = d > 0)) +
  geom_bar()

good_data %>%
  filter(!base & correct) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = d > 0)) +
  geom_bar()


```

```{r}

hr_by_trial %>%
  with(lm(hr ~ d + pixeld)) %>% 
  summary()

hr_by_trial %>%
  with(lm(hr ~ ogd + pixeld)) %>% 
  summary()

hr_by_trial %>%
  ggplot(aes(d)) +
  geom_density()

hr_by_trial %>%
  filter(hr > 0) %>%
  ggplot(aes(d)) +
  geom_density()

hr_by_trial %>%
  filter(hr > 0) %>%
  ggplot(aes(lvd)) +
  geom_density()

hr_by_trial %>%
  ggplot(aes(ogd)) +
  geom_density()

hr_by_trial %>%
  filter(hr > 0) %>%
  ggplot(aes(ogd)) +
  geom_density()


```

```{r}


delta_hr_by_scene <- hr_by_trial %>%
  arrange(d) %>%
  group_by(scene) %>%
  summarise(dhr = diff(hr),
            dd = diff(d),
            dogd = diff(ogd))


delta_hr_by_scene %>%
  with(lm(dhr ~ dogd)) %>% 
  summary()

delta_hr_by_scene %>%
  ggplot(aes(dhr)) +
  geom_histogram() +
  ggtitle("Distribution of difference in hr (high - low)")


```

```{r dprime}

fp_by_scene <- good_data %>%
  group_by(scene) %>%
  filter(base) %>%
  summarise(fp = 1 - mean(correct))

dprime_by_trial <- hr_by_trial %>%
  left_join(fp_by_scene, by = "scene") %>%
  mutate(d.prime = qnorm(hr) - qnorm(fp))

dprime_by_trial %>%
  with(lm(d.prime ~ lvd + pixeld)) %>%
  summary()


dprime_by_trial %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = d, y = d.prime, color = zpixeld)) + 
  geom_jitter() + 
  geom_smooth(method = "lm") + 
  ggtitle("D-prime as a function of path difference")

dprime_by_trial %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = lvd, y = d.prime, color = zpixeld)) + 
  geom_jitter() + 
  geom_smooth(method = "lm") + 
  ggtitle("D-prime as a function of path difference")

dprime_by_trial %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = pixeld, y = d.prime)) + 
  geom_jitter() + 
  geom_smooth(method = "lm") + 
  ggtitle("D-prime as a function of path difference")


dprime_by_trial %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = lvd, y = d, color = zpixeld)) + 
  geom_jitter() + 
  geom_smooth(method = "lm") + 
  ggtitle("D-prime as a function of path difference")

```

```{r delta dprime}


delta_dprime_by_scene <- dprime_by_trial %>%
  arrange(d) %>%
  group_by(scene) %>%
  summarise(dd.prime = abs(diff(d.prime)),
          dd = diff(d),
            dpixeld = diff(pixeld))


delta_dprime_by_scene %>%
  with(lm(dd.prime ~ dd + dpixeld)) %>% 
  summary()

delta_dprime_by_scene %>%
ggplot(aes(y = dd.prime, x = dd, color = dpixeld)) +
geom_jitter() +
geom_smooth(method = "lm") +
ggtitle("Change in D' as a function of counterfactual shifts")


delta_dprime_by_scene %>%
  ggplot(aes(y = dd.prime, x = dpixeld)) +
  geom_jitter() +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm") +
  ggtitle("Change in D' as a function of counterfactual shifts")

delta_dprime_by_scene %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = dd.prime)) +
  geom_histogram(binwidth = 0.1) +
  ggtitle("Distribution of change in dprime")


```
